channel.title: People Are People on Trisha Gee
channel.description: Recent content in People Are People on Trisha Gee

item.title: Why the customer isn't always right
item.description: Last week I went to get my hair cut (yes, sorry, this is a story about hair).  I had thought long and hard about what I wanted.  I researched, checked styles online, and bought a magazine so I could show my hairdresser exactly what I was after and there would be no confusion.  I was determined I would not be spending that ridiculous amount of money on something I was not going to be happy with.
